content: pdf pattern yoga socks english version size narrow feet - wide feet crochet level beginner format pdf 6 pages 1 2 mb mobile devices friendly language - english the pattern is written using usa crochet terms contains written row by row pattern of the yoga socks with photos aprox 10 skills chain stitch single_crochet single crochet back loop only materials 1 yarn of group 1 fingering/ 4-ply- super fine 420 m 459 yds / 100 g 3 5 oz 65 - 75 g 2 25 2 65 oz i used regia 4-ply schachenmayr color 00525 for example rico design superba 4-ply schoppel-wolle admiral 4 fach / 4-ply lang yarns jawoll color 4-fach austermann step drops fabel hjertegarn aloe sockwool strømpegarn alize superwash artisan cheval blanc balade g-b wolle sprint mayflower mars sock yarn hobbii dolce sock wool and happy feet kremke soul wool edelweiss classic gründl hot socks katia united socks knit picks static 2 crochet hook 2 5 mm 3 scissors 4 markers 5 measuring tape 6 tapestry needle gauge 26 single_crochet blo x 28 row = 10 cm/ 4 inch in width and 10 cm/ 4 inch vertically for 2 5 mm hook size or size needed to get pattern restrictions please respect my effort don t share copy or post this masterclass without my written permission finished product restrictions feel free to use the finished product as you like you can sell it exchange or donate it however i would very appreciate if you keep the link that it was made by pattern from @madebyasya good luck and great crocheting
